pages.text: Fox cages were a requested item that allows a player to right click on a fox and transport it to another biome easily.$(br)To catch the fox, with the cage in hand, right click on the fox and you will see the fox head in the cage in your inventory.$(br)After moving to your destination, right click on any block to release the fox and the cage will disappear. This cage will not work in creative.

pages.title: Catching a Fox
pages.text: Get close enough to right click the cage on the fox.
To craft a fox cage is a simple process. You will need oak planks, and iron bars.
